title: FDA: Antigen tests may have reduced sensitivity detecting Omicron
content:
1. FDA: Antigen tests may have reduced sensitivity detecting Omicron  POLITICO

  5. As the Omicron variant continues to spread, testing sites are harder to find  FOX13 Memphis
